meanings.definition: To shout "hoorah" in celebration or approval.
meanings.sent1: The crowd hoorahed loudly when the team scored a goal.
meanings.sent2: She hoorahed with joy when she found out she got the job.
meanings.sent3: The children hoorahed in delight as they opened their presents.
meanings.sent4: The mountains hoorahed with echoes of their cheers.
meanings.sent5: The entire town hoorahed in unison, filling the air with excitement.

meanings.sent1: After the game, they hoorahed in victory.
meanings.sent2: He hoorahed when he heard the good news.
meanings.sent3: The cat hoorahed in its sleep, dreaming of past triumphs.
meanings.sent4: The old tree hoorahed with memories of days gone by.
meanings.sent5: The stars hoorahed in the night sky, a silent celebration of the past.
